text: Di madagoaa John ne hoohoo ga haga lawa ana hegau, mee ga helekai gi nia daangada boloo, ‘Goodou e hagabau bolo au koai? Ma hagalee ko au dela e talitali go goodou. Hagalongo! Mee e hanimoi i ogu muli, gei au la hagalee tau loo bolo e daa gi daha nia suudi o Maa!’13.25 Matthew 3.11; Mark 1.7; Luke 3.16; John 1.20,27
